trans-unit.source: Group By Clause (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: Group By 子句 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Group By Clause (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: Group By 子句 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Groups the elements of a query result.
trans-unit.target: 对查询结果的元素进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Can also be used to apply aggregate functions to each group.
trans-unit.target: 也可用于将聚合函数应用于每个组。

trans-unit.source: The grouping operation is based on one or more keys.
trans-unit.target: 分组运算基于一个或多个键。

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Parts
trans-unit.target: 部件

trans-unit.source: `listField1`, `listField2`
trans-unit.target: `listField1`, `listField2`

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: One or more fields of the query variable or variables that explicitly identify the fields to be included in the grouped result.
trans-unit.target: 分组结果中将包括一个或多个显式标识字段的查询变量的一个或多个字段。

trans-unit.source: If no fields are specified, all fields of the query variable or variables are included in the grouped result.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定字段，则分组结果中将包括一个或多个查询变量的所有字段。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: An expression that identifies the key to use to determine the groups of elements.
trans-unit.target: 标识键以用于确定元素所在的组的表达式。

trans-unit.source: You can specify more than one key to specify a composite key.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定多个键以形成组合键。

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: One or more additional keys that are combined with `keyExp1` to create a composite key.
trans-unit.target: 与 `keyExp1` 结合以形成组合键的一个或多个其他键。

trans-unit.source: Required.
trans-unit.target: 必需。

trans-unit.source: One or more expressions that identify how the groups are aggregated.
trans-unit.target: 标识如何对组进行聚合的一个或多个表达式。

trans-unit.source: To identify a member name for the grouped results, use the `Group` keyword, which can be in either of the following forms:
trans-unit.target: 若要标识分组结果的成员名称，请使用 `Group` 关键字，它可以采用以下任意一种形式：

trans-unit.source: -or-
You can also include aggregate functions to apply to the group.
trans-unit.target: 还可以包含聚合函数以将其应用于该组。

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: 备注

trans-unit.source: You can use the `Group By` clause to break the results of a query into groups.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 `Group By` 子句来将查询的结果分解为组。

trans-unit.source: The grouping is based on a key or a composite key consisting of multiple keys.
trans-unit.target: 分组基于某个键或包含多个键的组合键。

trans-unit.source: Elements that are associated with matching key values are included in the same group.
trans-unit.target: 与匹配的键值相关联的元素包括在同一组中。

trans-unit.source: You use the `aggregateList` parameter of the `Into` clause and the `Group` keyword to identify the member name that is used to reference the group.
trans-unit.target: 使用 `aggregateList` 子句的 `Into` 参数和 `Group` 关键字来标识用于引用该组的成员名称。

trans-unit.source: You can also include aggregate functions in the `Into` clause to compute values for the grouped elements.
trans-unit.target: 还可以将聚合函数包括在 `Into` 子句中，以计算分组元素的值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of standard aggregate functions, see [Aggregate Clause](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/aggregate-clause.md).
trans-unit.target: 标准聚合函数的列表，请参阅[Aggregate 子句](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/queries/aggregate-clause.md)。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The following code example groups a list of customers based on their location (country) and provides a count of the customers in each group.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例根据客户所在的位置（国家/地区）对客户列表进行分组，并提供了每个组中的客户计数。

trans-unit.source: The results are ordered by country name.
trans-unit.target: 按国家/地区名称对结果进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The grouped results are ordered by city name.
trans-unit.target: 按城市名称对分组结果进行排序。
